EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Spring Boot and Ratpack Web Framework.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Spring Boot and Ratpack Web Framework
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for registering for tomorrow's webinar Spring Boot and Ratpack Web Framework on Thursday, March 31, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, March 31, 2016
Time: 10:00AM PDT (San Francisco, CA)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1153851/BCB202520BFD14CA62082049FC55801F]]>
Audio Information:
This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
